name: hses_freinds
description: This is a git repository for the development of HSES of Friends website and open source tool for other schools to use a template to create as well.

scripts.build: webpack -d && cp src/index.html src/home.html src/css src/fonts src/images dist && webpack-dev-server --content-base src/ --inline --hot
scripts.build:prod: webpack -p && cp src/index.html src/home.html src/css src/fonts src/images dist

author: andreGarvin
